fields.title: Math
fields.description: Mathematics is a field of study that discovers and organizes methods, theories and theorems that are developed and proved for the needs of empirical sciences and mathematics itself.

fields.title: Biology
fields.description: Biology is a branch of science that deals with living organisms and their vital processes

fields.title: History of Kazakhstan
fields.description: Kazakhstan has been inhabited since the Paleolithic era. In antiquity, various nomadic Iranian peoples such as the Saka, Massagetae, and Scythians dominated the territory, with the Achaemenid Persian Empire expanding towards the southern region.

fields.title: English
fields.description: English is a West Germanic language in the Indo-European language family, whose speakers, called Anglophones, originated in early medieval England on the island of Great Britain.
